---
name: Enhancement
about: Suggest an improvement to existing functionality
title: '[ENHANCEMENT] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Current Behavior
Describe the current functionality that needs improvement.

## Proposed Enhancement
A clear description of how you'd like to enhance the existing feature.

## Motivation
Why is this enhancement important? What problem does it solve?

## Implementation Suggestions
If you have ideas on how to implement this, share them here.

## Impact
- Who will benefit from this enhancement?
- What areas of the project will be affected?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, code examples, or screenshots about the enhancement here.
